title: Valencia defender Gabriel Paulista's 10-second red card
description: Valencia defender Gabriel Paulista was sent off against Las Palmas after picking up two yellow cards in the space of just 10 seconds on Saturday night.
content: Seven minutes into the second half the Brazilian centre-back, who joined Los Che from Arsenal last August, was initially penalised for handball when blocking a header at close range.The referee immediately pointed to the penalty spot, however, Gabriel was less than impressed and his protests went too far, earning the player a second yellow card, swiftly followed by a red.Watch the above video to see Gabriel's moment of madness
